p: Sputum biomarkers of infection and inflammation have previously been suggested as correlates of present disease severity ( 10). In particular elastase, interleukin-8 (IL-8), matrix metalloproteinase (MMP)-9 and neutrophil counts were negatively correlated with current lung function ( 10, 11). Neutrophil elastase activity in BAL fluid in early life was associated with early bronchiectasis in children with CF ( 12).
